successes.title: Star Trek: Axanar
successes.description: "Axanar" is the story of Garth of Izar & the Battle of Axanar, a pivotal event in the history of the Federation.

Pledges.description: Your name on the backers page on the Star Trek Axanar website PLUS access to our "Donors Only" Facebook Group with exclusive content, production blogs, cast and crew interviews, behind the scenes videos and more. PLUS all donors get their name on the "Donor Wall of Fame" at the new Ares Studios when finished!
Receive all of the above plus a copy of the "Axanar" script in PDF form.

All of the above PLUS the official illustrated script from "Axanar" in PDF form. Chock full of photos and details on the cast and characters, this reads like a "Making of" book with a ton of behind the scenes info and images.
Receive all of the above plus a digital download of "Axanar".
All of the above PLUS you also get a PDF of the stunning "Prelude to Axanar" Premiere program.

The Starfleet "First Fleet Patch.  The fifth patch in the series of "Axanar" patches.  This all new patch is the second fleet patch in the series and represents the Terran fleet that came out of UESPA.
NOTE:  New donors who donate at this level and above in the first five days of the Kickstarter get the previously released "Fifth Fleet - First to the Fight" patch free!
The official "Axanar" USS Ares challenge coin!  This 2" challenge coin has the USS Ares patch in full color on one side and the Ares arrowhead on the other.
Receive all of the above, plus the Special Edition DVD of the film.

As above, but instead of the DVD, you get the Special Edition "Axanar" Blu Ray with deleted scenes, vignettes, and special features.  This Blu Ray is produced by Robert Burnett, who produces all the Star Trek Enterprise and Next Generation Blu Rays for CBS
Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS get a limited edition cast photo signed by one of the stars of your choosing.  Richard Hatch, Tony Todd, Kate Vernon, JG Herztler or Gary Graham
Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS you get the all new limited edition black USS Ares T-shirt. Printed on the back is the USS Ares patch, and the ships spearhead design on the front.
Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS get a bound copy of the script, signed by the writers, Alec Peters and Christian Gossett and Script Consultant and Star Trek legend David Gerrold.

Be a casualty in the Four Years War!  Your photo will appear as a casualty in the Four Years War in Axanar: Heroes.  As Garth scrolls down the casualty list, your face and name will appear.  Get a high res screen cap of the image for your collection as well.  STAND ALONE LEVEL.  This does not include any other perks (you can buy additional perks of your choice after the Kickstarter).
This level combines the $ 100 and the $ 250 levels!   So you get everything up to and including the $ 100 level PLUS you get to be a casualty in the Four Years War!

Get your very own USS Ares uniform tunic!  Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS you will get a screen used tunic used in the production.  This tunic will come with a Certificate of Authenticity.  Sizes available are Men's M-2XL and S-XL for women.  Free shipping in the U.S. International shipping is charged at exact USPS shipping and billed later.

Receive ALL of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS get a limited edition Axanar 11" x 14" cast photo signed by the entire cast!  You get at least RIchard Hatch, Tony Todd, Kate Vernon, JG Herztler, Gary Graham and Alec Peters, PLUS any other major star added to the cast!

Receive ALL of the rewards up to $ 75 PLUS get a limited edition Axanar 11" x 14" cast photo signed by the entire cast! You get at least RIchard Hatch, Tony Todd, Kate Vernon, JG Herztler, Gary Graham and Alec Peters, PLUS any other major star added to the cast!
SET VISIT & MEAL WITH CAST AND CREW (Either NY or LA shoots)

Be our distinguished guest for a five (5) hour on-set visit for two (2) that allows you a glimpse in to the real work that goes in to making high-end independent Star Trek.  Mingle with the cast and crew that make it all happen, witness talent getting in to character through make-up and wardrobe, participate in behind-the-scenes documentary footage, spend time in the director's chair during filming, and enjoy a meal in our craft services area with the cast and crew.  Includes some great Axanar swag, a personally autographed photo of you with the featured talent shooting on the day of the visit, and an official Axanar crew badge that are all yours to take with you with our thanks.

Guests must be 18 year or older, have a valid photo ID for admission in to the studio, and must sign a non-disclosure agreement and likeness rights release. Be our guest at either New York for Axanar: Heroes, shooting in October 2014, or the Axanar feature, shooting Los Angeles fourth quarter 2014/first quarter 2015.  Lodging, and local transportation are the sole responsibility of the guests.

BE A PRODUCTION ASSISTANT! Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 plus be a P.A. for a week on either Axanar: Heores in NY or the Axanar feature film in L.A.!  You'll appear on the daily call sheet, and learn the business of making not only an independent film, but independent Star Trek!  You will work hard and play hard while on the front lines with every other member of the cast and crew from first call each morning to the final wrap at night.  Includes a valuable IMDB credit for your aspiring future and resume, too!

NAME A SHIP!  Receive all of the rewards up to $ 75 plus name one of the ships of Starfleet at the Battle of Axanar.  Your ship will be seen in the battle and the name will clearly be visible.   Plus your ship will be mentioned in the dialog.  In addition, you will get a digital version of your Starfleet. ship as one of our exclusive digital Wallpapers.
